rows.ROLE ENTRY POINTS: Different people start in different places. Find your path.
This model serves different people at different times.
Your entry point depends on your role.
Pick the one that fits you best:
A: I AM THE STUDIO FOUNDER / CAPITAL PROVIDER
You have: Capital (or access to it), the idea, strategic oversight
You need: An operator to run this, validation that it's worth pursuing
1. Read 'Phase 0: Trade Setup' → Understand what needs to be true before anything
2. Read 'Thesis' → Make sure the opportunity still makes sense
3. Read 'Operator Search Dashboard' → Find and hire the right person
4. Read 'Equity Strategy & Planning' → Structure the deal
5. Read 'Definition of Done' → Know what you're signing off on at each phase
Most operational tabs. Your operator will live in those.
Focus on: Thesis, Operator, Equity, Kill Criteria, Phase gates
B: I AM A POTENTIAL OPERATOR EVALUATING THIS
You're considering: Taking on this trade as your thing to run
You need: To understand the opportunity, the expectations, the deal
1. Read 'Thesis' → Does this opportunity excite you?
2. Read 'Unit Economics' → Does the math work?
3. Read 'Choreography' → What's the sequence? What will you actually do?
4. Read 'Operator Scorecard' → What's expected of you?
5. Read 'Operator Contract Template' → What's the deal structure?
6. Read 'Kill Criteria' → When does this get shut down?
• Do I believe in this product/market?
• Am I comfortable with the equity/cash split?
• Am I okay with the kill criteria?
IF YES → Move to Entry Point C (Day 1 Operator)
C: I AM THE HIRED OPERATOR, DAY 1
You have: The role, signed agreement, access to this model
You need: To understand what to do NOW and ignore the rest
1. Read 'Cognitive Load Guide' → What to ignore
2. Read 'Command Center' → Your daily home base
3. Read 'Phase 0: Trade Setup' → Is setup complete? If not, finish it
5. Read 'High-Leverage Tab Map' → The 7 tabs that matter most
Scale phase tabs (you're not there yet)
D: I AM BOTH STUDIO AND OPERATOR (Solo Founder)
You have: Capital, time, willingness to execute
You need: To wear both hats without losing your mind
1. Read 'Phase 0: Trade Setup' → Complete all setup items
2. Read 'Cognitive Load Guide' → Critical for solo founders
4. Read 'High-Leverage Tab Map' → Only focus on these
5. Read 'Really Good is Really Rare' → You can't do everything well
• Be ruthless about what NOT to do
• No one to tell you to stop
E: I AM AN ADVISOR / INVESTOR DOING DILIGENCE
You need: To understand the opportunity and how it's structured
2. Read 'Unit Economics' → Does the math work?
